author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: In a large bowl mix together the oats, raisins, apricots and hazelnuts. Pour over the apple juice and leave for 10-15 minutes to allow the oats and dried fruit to soak up the juice. Divide the muesli between 6 glass bowls and top with the grated apple. Spoon on a dollop of yoghurt and drizzle over some honey. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 170g/6oz rolled oats,  170g/6oz raisins or sultanas,  110g/4oz dried apricots, roughly chopped,  110g /4oz hazelnuts, split in half and roasted,  350ml/12fl oz fresh apple juice,  2 apples (coxes or granny smiths) peeled and coarsely grated,  1 small tub Greek or natural yoghurt,  4 ripe apricots, roughly chopped,  clear honey to serve
